markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs=""
>
[Big Rock Bullet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1248)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 14</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** sling bullet

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _big rock bullet_ is a sling bullet made of heavy granite, but each piece of ammunition feels much more dense than it appears. When activated, a _big rock bullet_ transforms into a giant rock just before hitting the target. The target takes 4d6 additional bludgeoning damage on a successful hit. Even on a failed attack roll (but not a critical failure), the target takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage. Creatures with the [Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7) reaction can use it against a _big rock bullet_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Big Rock Bullet
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 14</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Big Rock Bullet (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 14</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The bullet deals 8d6 additional bludgeoning damage, or 4d6 on a failure.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Big Rock Bullet (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 14</row>

**Price** 1,150 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The bullet deals 12d6 additional bludgeoning damage, or 6d6 on a failure.
name: Big Rock Bullet (Major)
